content: round and round we go to make this colorful crochet scarf worked in the round using caron slice of anniversary cakes practice granny stitch double_crochet chain stitch fringe and more you ll love watching the prismatic colors shift and blend as you go keep it vibrant for a playful high-energy look or choose a color palette that suits your style whether you re enhancing your wardrobe or gifting it to someone special it s a fashionable layer for the colder months materials caron® slice of anniversary cakes™ 8 8 oz/250g 285 yds /260 m prismatic 03003 2 balls or 490 yds/440 m measurements approx 10 x 90 25 5 x 228 5 cm excluding fringe
